website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few noted stitch and sizing issues, these socks offer notable performance and are a great choice if you need 2 pairs.
pros: Suitable for almost any activity – from skiing to hiking to running and more
cons: Sizes often run too small or too large
Stitching occasionally comes loose with normal wear

customer_reviews.title: The best socks
customer_reviews.text: Best socks we have ever purchased. They were worth every penny, and we originally thought they were over priced. My husband ran the 24 hour Spartan Ultra World Championship in Iceland, which was in brutal conditions. These socks kept his feet comfortable and warm through 20 straight hours of running in the snow/wind through the iclandic mountains. He was totally impressed and commented a lot about how much he loved the socks. We would purchase again if need be. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Fox

customer_reviews.title: My feet were warm and comfortably dry throughout my run
customer_reviews.text: I wore a pair yesterday for the first time. The fit was loose, but not so much that I had any concerns while running. I ran for almost 2 hrs on frozen ground, in the wind, and it was never above 20 F (-6 C). I did wear a very thin nylon sock liner with it. My feet were warm and comfortably dry throughout my run. Normally, on a run this cold, my feet would be numb with cold and just pounding it out. I'll try them out with my xc ski boots, next. I'm expecting good things.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Must Have if You Work Outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: If you have boots that are no longer water resistant these socks are life savers! I wear a cotton sock under mine, and my feet rarely sweat so that is not an issue I encounter with them as far as I can tell they breathe well. They keep my feet dry all day at work being outdoors against morning dew, puddles, rain, etc. The knee high ones keep my legs dry also when its pouring rain and my pants are soaked much easier to get through the work day.
customer_reviews.author: KittenBitten

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably amazing! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I of course was skeptical about these socks. Because how can they be waterproof right!? Well my brothers in the navy and they make them march in even the pouring rain and they step through puddles. And they do this for hours. He would show us his feet in video calls. And I was worried about his feet being wet for so long. So I thought I’d try these out for him. He video called us and was so impressed with these socks! He was so thankful! His boots were filled with water but his feet were not wet AT ALL! I couldn’t believe it!
customer_reviews.author: Jme

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Dog's Leg Dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair of socks for a dog with a wrap on her foot and lower leg that needs to stay dry. She leaves the sock alone far longer than a plastic e-collar or a fabric e-collar, and it stretches on better than dog booties. Also very durable. Fitting will depend on some luck, since your vet's wrap may vary. Liked them so well we bought some for humans to use, too.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Not actually 100% Waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are interesting. I took them creek hiking, and they actually held up! I was literally in the creek for the whole 7 mile hike and they kept my feet pretty dry, that was until water got in over the top, then they were useless. However if you don't plan to be getting into deep water, these work perfectly. I also recommend wearing thin sock liners with these, because the inside isn't the most breathable, and the liners help. The biggest problem is that when the inside gets wet, they stay pretty wet. For the price, these socks are pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Brasch

customer_reviews.title: Yeah WATERPROOF!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the socks for trail running in winter. I was struggling to keep my feet warm and dry running through freezing cold puddles of mud and snow. I wore these and my feet were warm and waterproof the entire time. I would highly recommend these. I did not have waterproof trail shoes but I could use these socks and I kept my feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping in the rain!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot write enough about how much I love these socks. I took them camping in a northern Arizona pine forest, and in addition to keeping my feet bone dry (even during monsoon season), nothing from the forest floor stuck to my feet. I mean *nothing*. I am used to spending a min or two dusting off my wool socks before I get into my tent, but with these, I could easily walk around the camp site with no shoes then get straight into my tent, bringing nothing with me. I was leery of the price at first but I’m definitely going to buy a few more pairs before my next camping trip. These were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The socks were purchased to keep my feet dry while working in wet weather since my work boots aren't waterproof. the exterior of the socks got wet, feels soaked and holds water on the outer layer only. The inside stays dry and warm. Your feet do not feel sweaty and are breathable. the material feels somewhat of a wetsuit a surfer would wear. I tested the socks on feet while standing in bathtub of water for 5 mins. Incredible. complaints and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James Horner

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: My husband works in the oilfield in all kinds of weather. We have spent $200+ on boots that claim to be waterproof and for a couple of months are, but the first real rain, my husband would come home with soaking wet feet. These socks are an answer to prayer. The insides of his boots are wet, but his feet stay dry!! Thank you for an amazing product!! I have bought more for my dad and brother!
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Kincheloe

customer_reviews.title: Really useful!
customer_reviews.text: Put them on and got right in the tub. Worked to keep the water out! The fabric does get wet but not through all layers to your skin. Would recommend and absolutely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: These work great. Have used others in past but they were ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Have used others in past but they were tight and no room. These feel soft and warm inside, slight elastic stretch feel on outside. Have used in snow and find that othey work well as a medium weight insulator. Just layer if need more heat without sweaty or wet feet.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: N
customer_reviews.text: Feel kinda like neoprene covered in sock material but very well made, stylish, and waterproof in the tub. They weren't too bulky in my shoes and flexible. Just don't know if they breathe as advertised as I haven't hiked strenuously enough to get sweaty feet. But will take to Camino
customer_reviews.author: Amac

customer_reviews.title: Best Disney Socks Ever!
customer_reviews.text: In Florida, it rains every day at 1pm. When you're out in the park, stepping in puddles, it is no fun with wet feet. I used to take a spare set of socks in a ziplock bag with me, but now I just wear these. I can stand in 6" of water and my feet don't get wet at all! I highly recommend these to anyone who has to deal with wet weather. I do wish they came in regular colors, though. These gray ones aren't too bad, but I don't really want my socks to be the brightest thing I'm wearing. Still worth five stars because they work and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: HE LOVES THEM
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen someone so excited about socks. I gave these to my boyfriend for work and his face LIT UP, he threw one on his foot, ran to the bathroom, stuck his foot in the sink and turned on the water and yelled 'HOLY SH** BABY THEY WORK!!" I felt the socks after and they were completely dry. Best. Purchase. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mumbach

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves these for the winter. He works outdoors and any warmth/water resistance he can get he will take. I wore them outside after it had rained just to test them out; and no rain came through what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: kelsea.

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: 6 miles in light rain all was well, super warm and dry. 31 miles in nonstop slogging mud and they did a decent job. Kept out major water but did ultimately allow my feet to get wet. Overall still happy with them. Maybe just a tad large but mostly true to size. They are not super tight and stretchy - more like an over sock.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: My feet stay dry and don't sweat
customer_reviews.text: I needed waterproof socks for my work boots. I water an acre of plants every other day. These socks ARE waterproof and my feet don't sweat. They seemed pricey but they aren't like normal socks. They are sturdy. I don't expect them to wear out anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: H. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my trip and my feet!
customer_reviews.text: Took on trip to Madagascar during rainy season, saved the day, week, and my feet! These are so much better than the old seal skins, actually fit and feel like socks. Get a little damp from sweat, but much better than using baggies in wet boots! Worth every cent AND good looking, too!
customer_reviews.author: Anne E. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Too big for average female foot
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea but the small size was way too big for my female feet. I wear a 7.5 in street shoes and a 8.5 in running shoes. There is no way that my feet in these socks would fit in my hiking shoes. It wasn't the length of them as much as it was the width that was too big.
customer_reviews.author: CarolH

customer_reviews.title: Nice waterproof socks
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much. I bought it for my son for the obstacle race. The socks keep his feet at least dry throughout the mud ride. Even the shoes are completely soaked with mud. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet!
customer_reviews.text: Used for road cycling on a winter day. 40 degrees? Feet were way warmer than using my wool socks. I plan on using with trail runners for hiking and was pleasantly surprised that i can also use on my bicycle rides. Good product and green grey color is very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Zombro

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Read the size and it matches what it says! I almost bought bigger couldn’t believe I was a size small. Wore them at a mud run and they were AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Desiree stang

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking & wet winter trails
customer_reviews.text: I wear liner toe socks underneath them for toe chaffing reasons (I’m a long distance trail runner). But my liner socks are always sweaty but not soaked. My feet aren’t covered in mud. My socks are two years old and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best socks that I have worn. I am very active as a soccer coach and the field is always wet. With these socks I have no issue. I now wear them on hikes and hunting. Great socks.
customer_reviews.author: 6KBSTay

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof for only a week of use.
customer_reviews.text: I work outside and come into contact with water on a regular basis. I thought these sock would be a great investment to keep my feet dry throughout the work day, but after a week of use, they were no longer waterproof and instead would allow the water to come in the sock and stay trapped in the interior of the sock as I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Granger

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product as a gift to my daughter and son-in-law. So far they have not said any disagreeable issues with this product. I am sure it will serve its purpose for them when they are snowshoeing this winter. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dana L

customer_reviews.title: Good for wet climates
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a friend doing fieldwork in Indonesia and she said she liked them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not for summer
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and it is real waterproof, but it is hot on it and thus it is not for summer as it was claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Onethurd

customer_reviews.title: He loves them and I'm very glad I came across this product
customer_reviews.text: My dad works in pool construction and would always get his feet wet, I always make sure he packs a couple of these when he travels far. He loves them and I'm very glad I came across this product. This is definitely waterproof, and according to him allows his feet to breath as well.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent socks for hiking
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our hike during the winter at Havasupai, AZ. We had hiked through mud and water which was mid way up our hiking shoes. Our shoes got wet but our feet stayed dry. If you plan on hiking in inclement weather, get them.
customer_reviews.author: Dual citizen

customer_reviews.title: dry feet
customer_reviews.text: I work in a dish room at a college, lots of water on floor, MY FEET STAY DRY..
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Too bulky to wear shoes over. I wear them for winter kayaking and they are not quite warm enough. Going to try layering socks underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Employee #427

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Love these comfy socks especially in the fall and winter.
customer_reviews.author: angeleyes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband who is a UPS driver and they keep his feet dry even on the rainiest day when his boots are completely soaked through.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: DONT SUBMERGE FOOT WITH THESE
customer_reviews.text: Submerged my foot into water and it was waterproof for about 10 seconds before my entire foot was soaked. FYI. Purchased for the polar plunge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my fiance who works in a kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my fiance who works in a kitchen and always had wet feet after he was done working. Even working all day in the hot kitchen his feet stay dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet dry!
customer_reviews.text: My ASICS have air vents but wearing the Randy Sun socks keeps the moisture off my feet. Great for walks early in the morning after rain or heavy dew. I am very pleased with them & plan to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Burton

customer_reviews.title: RANDY SUN Men Knee Length Ultralite Waterproof Socks
customer_reviews.text: 4/22/2017 Great sturdy socks, air breathable but waterproof. Chased a friend's dog into a shallow body of water and my feet remained dry (can't say the same thing for my pants legs). Suggested washing instructions: wash twice, inside and out, drying twice. Medium high wash, medium dry. Sturdy, very comfortable (wearing them now @work), comes in a variety of neato nutty colors. RECOMMEND: Buy a few (I did).
customer_reviews.author: Allen NakagawaTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet warm sitting in the stand hunting! Nothing like sweaty cold feet in your boots for hours, but these kept everything toasty. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: xaghce

customer_reviews.title: Only good if you want dry feet
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the Florida national Guard and let me tell you, not a lot can make trudging through a swamp more comfortable, but being knee deep in green water with dry feet is a pretty good feeling. They work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Required name

customer_reviews.title: Dry feet through a 32 mile snowy, slushy hike!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little big, but i wore socks underneath. They really protected my feet through 32 miles of snow, puddles and slush.
customer_reviews.author: victoria adams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Just be careful how you wash and dry them! Accidentally turned a pair of my husbands socks into mine....
customer_reviews.author: Spring K.

customer_reviews.title: They are waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I love these I am going to get some for my kids too. They are great for Washington beaches that are never warm.... I usually wear then with a pair of woolbsocks and they still fit in my shoes!
customer_reviews.author: S.pony

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: They are very difficult to get off after sweating in them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike prete

customer_reviews.title: This is truly waterproof. I purchased them to use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is truly waterproof. I purchased them to use for gardening. It keeps my feet and lower legs dry. I have washed them several times and they have so far maintained their integrity and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Re-design please
customer_reviews.text: The seem goes down the center of the sock. Like awkward sandals. Hopefully I can get past how uncomfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son works outside & this winter has been very snowy & wet.....these socks have been a great addition to his cold weather wardrobe!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Greatly waterproof!!! Feet stayed warm and dry the whole time during our hiking and camping trip. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I took them to Iceland with me and I'm glad I did! You can also wear them on top of regular socks and I didn't feel cold in my feet
customer_reviews.author: Chuska

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I used these socks on a hike during which I had to wade through sections of a river. They quickly filled up with water and when I took them off at the end of the hike, the tip of the sock was like a balloon filled with water. Maybe they're water resistant, but fully submerging your feet for more than a few moments is more than the sock can take.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Michalowicz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are a good fit. Price was good and the colors are fun. Bought a pair for myself and for my husband. We have only tired them on, haven’t tested them in a creek crossing yet.
customer_reviews.author: raebaby88

customer_reviews.title: Kept my feet dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a girl scout trip I was going on with my daughter's troop. Sure enough, it rained like crazy. Wore these socks with breathable running shoes. Feet stayed dry and the shoes dried out overnight. The socks run a little large so I was able to wear small athletic socks underneath. It also helped that my running shoes are on the large side as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepsue

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Was waterproof until i was submerged then the whole sock got soaked
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: YES! they are great for our very rainy walks. Feet totally dry!
customer_reviews.author: colleen smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Socks for Hiking
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you dry and doesn't sweat your feet. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kiser

customer_reviews.title: They’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the fit and my feet didn’t perspire in warm weather. I haven’t had a chance to test if they’re 100% waterproof but definitely feel like they’ll be perfect for a trip to Iceland in August.
customer_reviews.author: Yo Momma

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: Worked crossing ankle high stream without wet feet. Were comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas CoffeyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: I never wore waterproof socks before, it's kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: I never wore waterproof socks before, it's kind of odd feeling wearing stiff socks. It's for sure a bit bigger, not snug on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient at keeping my feet dry! I am a size 10 and the large was a little tight but I’m glad my feet weren’t wet!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: These work well.
customer_reviews.text: Warm, dry comfortable and easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: work as stated. Is there a 1/2 sock with a non slip bottom? Would be perfect for boaters.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful socks
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE. Work 12 hour shifts at a factory and they keep my feet dry the entire time
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Really waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Husband complained about his feet getting wet at work so I bought these to try out. They work wonderfully! He has bragged on them since he first wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Oyler

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING SOCKS. I buy these every Christmas and with being worn every single day they last until the following Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: Keep feet warm and dry, not too thick for normal shoes. I coach soccer in the wet cold winter season, theses socks are great. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Clavier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pair of waterproof socks
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and keeps my feet dry. I live in a country and walk 10 miles a day on the wet grass and this pair of socks keeps my feet dry. I really love it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears them all the time and they’re actually waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha Sadolsky

customer_reviews.title: These are functional but still very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great socks. Did a creek crossing in my mesh-top hikers, and my feet stayed dry and warm. They are comfortable socks, and while you might expect your feet to sweat in waterproof socks on long hikes, they don't!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are spectacular! we use them for hiking and skiing and the haven't failed us!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping your feet dry!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect - absolutely 100% waterproof - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof socks.
customer_reviews.text: Used these socks on a long day of hiking in wet conditions worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Keeps his feet dry and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: MY husband loves these socks. Keeps his feet dry and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Truly Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these socks. They keep his feet dry and warm. After washing, they do take a day to dry thoroughly, so plan ahead!
customer_reviews.author: fischy61

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I wore these socks on a Spartan Race in the mud and snow and they kept my feet dry! Will definitely use again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Will def buy these for the rest of my fam
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable too!
customer_reviews.text: Used during paintball where we played in damp grass and crossing creeks! Inside of boots got wet but never soaked through the socks! Comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: waterproof worked
customer_reviews.text: seems to run a bit big but worked for what i needed
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 2 weeks then stitching in sock ripped
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Snyder-scipio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these socks! I was skeptical about them being waterproof but I've hiked thru streams, puddles and mud and my feet stay dry. The 3-layer construction does make the sock really thick so I'll buy shoes a half size larger for best comfort. AWESOME product! Gonna buy my wife a pair...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 100% Waterproof Hiking Socks, [SGS Certified] RANDY SUN Unisex Ventilated Breathable Skiing Trekking Sock
product_meta.description:
RANDY SUN Men's Mid-Calf Waterproof & Highly Breathable Socks Athletic Socks.

The waterproof socks can make your feet enjoy freedom of movement all the time, and it is not only wind proof and water proof but also highly moisture and perspiration .
Its special three layer design ingeniously solved the contradiction between water proofing property and air permeability.

The strong adhesive three layers structure can prevent the external water molecules into socks, meanwhile spread feet sweat during the movement quickly to the outside of the socks.
Even in mountain climbing, hiking, running, outdoor cycling, water sports, snow sports, adventure, hunting, fishing, outdoor gardening and so on all kinds of bad environment, it could still keep your feet dry and comfortable. It is also a good choice to use as rain socks in rainy day.

Our waterproof and breathable socks is the first choice for outdoor enthusiasts, as well as military personnel, postal personnel, even some special outdoor operation of protective equipment.
100% seamless, comfortable, dry and warm, so our breathable and waterresistant socks also can be used for daily wearing, change daily beriberi due to the foot sweat and cold feed caused by bad warmth retention property footwear and so on all kinds of discomfort.


Size:
the Extra Small size socks fit US men 5-7 and women 6-8;
the Small size socks fit US men 7.5-9.5 and women 8.5-11;
the Medium size socks fit US men 10-12.5 and women 11.5-13.5;
the Large size socks fit US men 13-15 and women 14-16.

Guarantee
We stand behind our waterproof socks with a money back guarantee. If you are not happy with your socks, feel free to return them for a full and prompt refund. If you have questions about our waterproof socks, we would love to hear from you.
feature_bullets: Outer: 61% high waterproof nylon, 32% polyester, 7% elastane;Interlayer: a high performance lightweight function of waterproof and breathable membrane, Lining: 66% coolmax, 30% polyester,4% elastane
☞ RANDY SUN’S DIFFERENCE☜ RANDY SUN Unisex Waterproof Hiking Skiing Socks is a new patent product that has been certified by SGS Corporation.100% Waterproof, 100% Inspection and 100% Seamless.

FOUR SIZES: Extra Small Size - fit for US men 5-7 and US women 6-8; Small Size - fit for US men 7.5-9.5 and US women 8.5-11; Medium Size - fit for US men 10-12.5 and US women 11.5-13.5; Large Size - fit for US men 13-15 and US women 14-16. Please refer to images on the left for more detailed size information.
Daily Wear,foot care,especially suitable for outdoor sports and activities of various kind of harsh environments
Keep your feet dry and health.
Ultra-light cushion sole provides comfort and great fit,suitable for biking,walking and running during warmer seasons when there is a need to keep dry feet
Hand wash under normal temperature,water temperature should be below 40 degree centigrade if machine wash, do not iron, dry clean or tumble dry but hang to dry after spin-dry in ventilated place
